verses.name: Mark 7:31
verses.text: And again, departing from the coasts of Tyre and Sidon, he came unto the sea of Galilee, through the midst of the coasts of Decapolis.

verses.name: Mark 7:32
verses.text: And they bring unto him one that was deaf, and had an impediment in his speech; and they beseech him to put his hand upon him.

verses.name: Mark 7:33
verses.text: And he took him aside from the multitude, and put his fingers into his ears, and he spit, and touched his tongue;

verses.name: Mark 7:34
verses.text: And looking up to heaven, he sighed, and saith unto him, Ephphatha, that is, Be opened.
